generate_dataframes

postprocessinglib.evaluation.metrics.generate_dataframes(csv_fpath: str, num_min: int = 0, start_date: str = '', end_date: str = '') → tuple[DataFrame, DataFrame]

Function to Generate the required dataframes

Parameters:

  • csv_fpath (string) – the path to the csv file. It can be relative or absolute

  • num_min (int) – number of days required to “warm up” the system

  • start_date (str) – The date at which you want to start calculating the metric [yyyy-mm-dd]

  • end_date (str) – The date at which you want the calculations to end [yyyy-mm-dd]

Returns:

the observed dataframe, the simulated dataframe

Return type:

tuple[pd.DataFrame, pd.DataFrame]

JUPYTER NOTEBOOK EXAMPLE

Example

Generate the observed and simulated dataframes from the csv file

 1from postprocessinglib.evaluation import metrics
 2
 3observed_all, simulated_all = metrics.generate_dataframes(csvfpath="MESH_output_streamflow.csv", num_min=365)
 4print(observed)
 5            QOMEAS_05BB001  QOMEAS_05BA001

 81981 1               9.85            -1.0

10     3              10.00            -1.0
11     4              10.10            -1.0
12...                   ...             ...

14     362            -1.00            -1.0
15     363            -1.00            -1.0
16     364            -1.00            -1.0
17     365            -1.00            -1.0

19print(simulated)

 1from postprocessinglib.evaluation import metrics
 2
 3observed_from_1992_FEB, simulated_from_1992_FEB = metrics.generate_dataframes(csvfpath="MESH_output_streamflow.csv",
 4    num_min=365, start_date="1992-02-29")
 5
 6"""
 7Notice how the index starts from the 29th of February i.e., 31 days in
 8January plus 29 in February equals 60)
 9"""
10print(observed_from_1992_FEB)
11       QOMEAS_05BB001  QOMEAS_05BA001
12YEAR JDAY
131992 60              7.37            -1.0
14     61              7.36            -1.0

 1from postprocessinglib.evaluation import metrics
 2
 3observed_till_2000, simulated_till_2000 = metrics.generate_dataframes(csvfpath="MESH_output_streamflow.csv",
 4    num_min=365, end_date="2000-12-31")
 5
 6"""
 7Notice how the index ends at December 31st i.e., day 366)
 8"""
 9print(observed_till_2000)
